text: Tzu Puh Yu says that deep in the mines live the heavenly deer. These fantastic animals want to surface and for that they seek the help of miners. They promise to lead them to the precious metal veins; when the slate fails, the deer harass the miners and they eventually reduce them, walling them into the galleries and fixing them with clay. Sometimes the deer are more and then they torture the miners and carry them to their deaths. Deer that emerge in daylight become a fertile liquid, spreading the pestilence. FIN
title: Los ciervos celestiales
author: nan Anónimo
